summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 15, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 41st Street to East 42nd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7948 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
